Title: Relates to waiving approval and income limitations on retirees employed in public schools
Summary: Relates to waiving approval and income limitations on retirees employed in public schools.
LawCode: Amd ยง211, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to waiving approval and income limitations on retirees employed in public schools; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
